snippet.title: World Slayer - a twisted nonlinear RPG for mobile platforms and PC
snippet.description:
Vote at Steam Greenlight!
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=904035307

World Slayer is a nonlinear turn-based RPG for mobile platforms and PC with an extensive freedom of choice, multiple competing factions, challenging, yet easy to learn battle mechanics, a detailed approach to role-playing, and twisted, emotionally rich storylines with a touch of parody and a lot of heart.
The game is currently in development.

Read more at:
https://world-slayer.com/
https://twitter.com/ws_rpg
https://www.facebook.com/World-Slayer-RPG-1878196469070944
